# Chapter 1: Getting Started

This chapter covers the basics of getting started.





## Installation

Updated installation instructions.

New step-by-step guide:

1. Ensure Python 3.10+ is installed
2. Run `pip install md-book`
3. Verify with `mdbook --version`




## Configuration

Updated Configuration section.

Create a configuration file named `book.toml`:

```toml
[book]
title = "Your Book Title"
author = "Author Name"
language = "en"
```


## First Steps

Once installed, you can:

1. Initialize a new book with `mdbook init`
2. Add chapters with `mdbook add`
3. Build the book with `mdbook build`

<!-- NOTE: 2024-01-16T14:30:00 - Consider adding more examples here -->





## Troubleshooting

If you encounter issues:

- Check your Python version
- Verify the installation
- Review the configuration file
